```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function() {
  try {
    const papersResponse = await fetch('papers/index.html');
    const papersHtml = await papersResponse.text();
    const papersDoc = new DOMParser().parseFromString(papersHtml, 'text/html');
    const paperItems = papersDoc.querySelectorAll('a[href*="posts/papers"]');
    const uniquePapers = new Set();
    paperItems.forEach(function(link) {
      if (link.textContent.trim().length > 3) uniquePapers.add(link.href);
    });
    const paperCountEl = document.getElementById('home-paper-count');
    if (paperCountEl) paperCountEl.textContent = uniquePapers.size || '0';
  } catch (e) {}
  
  try {
    const projectsResponse = await fetch('projects/index.html');
    const projectsHtml = await projectsResponse.text();
    const projectsDoc = new DOMParser().parseFromString(projectsHtml, 'text/html');
    const projectItems = projectsDoc.querySelectorAll('a[href*="posts/projects"]');
    const uniqueProjects = new Set();
    projectItems.forEach(function(link) {
      if (link.textContent.trim().length > 3) uniqueProjects.add(link.href);
    });
    const projectCountEl = document.getElementById('home-project-count');
    if (projectCountEl) projectCountEl.textContent = uniqueProjects.size || '0';
  } catch (e) {}
});
</script>
```
